plot: 10-year-old Harry is 'dumped' into a snotty prep school and tries to figure out how to escape. But his efforts have a rather surprising ending.
title: Escape from Raritan Prep
plot_es: 10-year-old Harry is 'dumped' into a snotty prep school and tries to figure out how to escape. But his efforts have a rather surprising ending.
plot_en: 10-year-old Harry is 'dumped' into a snotty prep school and tries to figure out how to escape. But his efforts have a rather surprising ending.
